name: 黃乾怡
objective:
本課程旨在使學生瞭解科技業各種製造的方法和程序，內容包含：半導體製造、微電子封裝、表面黏著技術裝、印刷電路板 PCB 製造、面板製程、統計製程管制
This course is intended to provide a comprehensive study of the Modern manufacturing processes .The course is designed principally to provide the following topics:
Semiconductor manufacturing
Electronics packaging
Surface mount technology
PCB manufacturing
Panel manufacturing
Statistical process control
schedule:
w1~3 Semiconductor manufacturing 半導體製造
w4~6 Electronics packaging 微電子封裝
w7~9 Surface mount technology 表面黏著技術裝
w10~11 PCB manufacturing 印刷電路板 PCB 製造
w12~14 Panel manufacturing 面板製程
w15~16 Statistical process control 統計製程管制
w 17~18 Teram report
scorePolicy:
Attendance 40%
Midterm 30%
Term report 30%
Class participation: extra bonus
